# API reference

The framework public API is documented from the TypeScript sources.

**Full API reference (generated by TypeDoc):** [api-reference](/api-reference/)

Import the public API from `@kispace-io/core` or `@kispace-io/core/api`:

```ts
import {
  appLoaderService,
  extensionRegistry,
  contributionRegistry,
  commandRegistry,
  workspaceService,
  type AppDefinition,
  type Extension,
} from '@kispace-io/core';
```

See [Concepts](/concepts/architecture) and [Guides](/guide/getting-started) for usage patterns.
